overview: Anne Costasèque joined Seventure in 2008 as a Partner. Her previous experience includes six years as partner at France Telecom Technologies Investissements, an investment fund of Orange, where she managed several investment projects, notably Smartjog (acquired by TDF — Telediffusion de France - in 2006), Astellia (listed on NYSE Alternext since December 2007), Streamezzo, Meeting One and Air2web. She also participated as a member of the board of directors of Trusted Logic and Ugiqube (ex-Netcelo). Anne started her career in 1994 at Orange, holding several operational and business development roles. Anne is a graduate of INSEAD (MBA 2001) and Telecom Paris (1993).
